title: THE PLATFORM Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: What ya'll ordering for the Platform? Can ya'll believe no one chose pizza? 🍕 SMH
Obviously everyone is supposed to eat the dish that they ordered for themselves.
The movie is so interesting that nobody noticed how the platform is literally floating and defying gravity, not even the characters question it.

The Panna cotta is the message. The girl was an illusion. The main character had been hallucinating for a while.

There was no girl. The panna cotta made it back to level 0. But the message was not understood.

You missed a small detail about Imoguiri's suicide, when Goreng ask how many floors, she said the system has 200 Floors, and after staying a month and witnessing the horrors and reality of the hole she was starting to feel despair and when she awoke to the new room being 202 and still mutiple floors below she committed suicide because everything she knows was a lie
description:
In this video we take a deep dive, review, recap and explain the ending to Netflix's latest horror film from Spain "The Platform". El Hoyo.
